text: @BahamaBen9 Passive/Active funds with $AMZN $GOOGL for last 4 years. Since Mar funds are 90% cashed, and parked in not so concentrated but still 75% in top 15 kind of portfolio
@sweatystartup @ChrisGuthrie Agreed. Long $baba 1/3rd size of $amzn with a market/bets 10x larger.

$BABA This company has dealt with so much adversity the last several years. USA Trade war, Ant Financial IPO blunder, now China in Monopoly probe. As a result it is trading significantly below its intrinsic value. Below is a recent comp. between $AMZN ($3,171)and $BABA (221.95)🐺 https://t.co/JYdaU3RyrI
Not just $amzn $tsla , who cares about those names . Only when they are moving do I care

Ppl can say “this year you got lucky” re: $TSLA $AMZN which were my biggest P/L producers .

I’m aware stocks don’t “only go up”. But luck is when preparation meets opportunity. I lost money Jan-Feb shorting these names before embracing my views on “overvalued” meant nothing

Right now there is a huge change in the game of shipping. They have advertisements on shipping box’s. This is great for advertising your brand if you just started a business. 

Im guessing it’ll be on all Amazon boxes soon. I’m investing in $AMZN 🤑.
